data.title: Shraddha Nigam's marriage lasted only 10 months with Karan Grover then married this TV actor
data.meta_description: Famous television actress Shraddha Nigam is celebrating her birthday today. Apart from being an actress, Shraddha Nigam is also a fashion de... | News Track
data.text:
Famous television actress Shraddha Nigam is celebrating her birthday today. Apart from being an actress, Shraddha Nigam is also a fashion designer. Shraddha made her debut in the television world with the serial Choodiyan, but through this show, Shraddha did not get special recognition. Thereafter, Shraddha got her real identity from Krishna Arjun. Shraddha became popular overnight through this show. Shraddha's name became one of the top actresses of television. Apart from this show, Shraddha has worked in many serials including Dekho Magar Pyaar Se, Darna Mana Hai, Kahani Ghar Ghar Ki, Kabhi Na Kabhi, Tu Kahe Agar.

These days the actress is away from the world of television. Let us tell you that Shraddha was not married to anyone else but Karan Singh Grover, who is called the handsome hunk of television. In the year 2008, Shraddha and Karan got married and settled down their house. Both of them dated for some time before marriage and then got married, but only after marriage there was turmoil in Shraddha's life. Shraddha and Karan's marriage lasted only for 10 months.

It is said that Karan's Casanova nature became the reason for the separation of the two. There were reports in the media that Shraddha had caught Karan cheating many times. It was discussed that Karan Singh Grover had an affair with choreographer Nicole of reality show 'Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa.' Eventually, Shraddha decided to divorce Karan and then the two separated. Shraddha married television actor Mayank Anand in the year 2012. Mayank has also worked in shows like Dil Mil Gaye and Naagin. Shraddha and Mayank are also running a fashion line since 2011. Apart from television serials, Shraddha has also worked in films. She has played the role of Sunil Shetty's sister in the film Aagaaz. Apart from this, she has also worked in some films of South Indian film industry.
